# gcore_reservedfixedip (Resource)

Represent reserved ips

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider gcore {
  user_name = "test@test.test"
  password = "testtest"
  gcore_platform = "http://api.stg-45.staging.gcdn.co"
  gcore_api = "http://10.100.179.92:33081"
}

resource "gcore_reservedfixedip" "fixed_ip" {
  project_id = 1
  region_id = 1
  type = "external"
  is_vip = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **is_vip** (Boolean)
- **type** (String) Available values is 'external', 'subnet', 'any_subnet', 'ip_address'

### Optional

- **fixed_ip_address** (String)
- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
- **last_updated** (String)
- **network_id** (String)
- **project_id** (Number)
- **project_name** (String)
- **region_id** (Number)
- **region_name** (String)
- **subnet_id** (String)

### Read-Only

- **allowed_address_pairs** (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--allowed_address_pairs))
- **status** (String)
